name: Color Hell
description:
This is a small bullet hell where you try to earn higher and higher scores the more comfortable you get with the amount of bullets on screen, as you are incentivized to spawn in more bullets to earn more points.

To Play:

  • Download, unzip, and run main.exe

Music was made by:

  • NecroseN
  • https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC-3Ia-lOCaBWzxIBqELUbww?app=desktop
  • https://necrosen.itch.io/
